fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance professionalism and readability, catering to the purpose of a resume/CV.
fontTheory.readability: The font choices prioritize readability, especially in the body text, ensuring easy scanning by potential employers.
fontTheory.hierarchy: A clear typographic hierarchy is maintained through distinct font families for headings, body text, and code elements.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The combination of Arial for headings and navigation, Georgia for body text, and Courier New for code blocks creates a harmonious and structured typographic system.
